## 119. CLAN
### Definition
Extended family, i.e. parents, their children, all older relatives, and cousins. In the context of Daghestan, this is supposed to be a more narrow term than <i>tukhum</i>, which means a ‘clan’ in a wider sense.

### Contexts
1) Muhammad’s wife is from our clan. 2) Patimat is not my daughter, but she is from my clan. 3) Our clan are craftsmen.
